Turn your indignation into action. Help us the hold the line.

We either win this cycle, or we risk losing everything all at once. 

8/8

There's not such thing as a perfect candidate or a perfect campaign.

The veto protection we have in NC is uncomfortably vulnerable. The risk of gerrymandered maps means a full takeover.

Donate. Volunteer. Connect with activists. Communicate.

7/

Communicate what is on the ballot 

Roe v. Wade
LGBTQ+ rights
Teacher pay
A living wage
Healthcare, including Medicaid expansion
The economy

6/

Understand what's at stake

The consequences couldn't be any higher and they continue to raise the bar. We either hold the line right now, or we lose for the next 15+ years.

WNC underperforms the rest of the state for turnout. This is the South, y'all. Use word of mouth.

5/

Keep extremists out of Raleigh

We fire the legislators who are incompetent and bad at their job. This means we win state house and senate seats in rural counties. To do this we need good candidates, rural campaign infrastructure, and messaging that connects with people.

4/

Protect the 2 NC Supreme Court seats

If @JudgeLucyInman and @ervin4supreme lose their elections, we will have gerrymandered maps in 2024.

Vote for both Lucy Inman and Sam Ervin IV in November. Do not skip this race.

3/

Protect Governor Cooper‚Äôs veto

If the GOP wins a supermajority, the Governor loses the veto and this harmful legislation is just the beginning.

We can not afford to lose a single State Assembly seat for any Democratic incumbent.

2/

The GOP will trample our constitutional rights.

What do we do?
